title: Video maker
creator_credit: Alliance Productions, Nine Network (Australia), Scott Young and Shane Yeend
brief_description: Video maker is designed to help transform the confused home video operator into a budding video director. This tape looks at topics such as focus, handheld and zoom, camera editing, depth of field and exposure as well as looking at terminology, different filming techniques and equipment.
